title: Bob: 3 Lives of Karma and Consequences
summary: This simulation follows Bob through 3 lives spanning 60 ticks. Starting with trust of 0.49 and ending at 0.57, the agent maintained stable behavior, experiencing 38 major events along the way. Key themes include: Karma and Consequences, Equilibrium and Stability. This narrative illustrates core Web4 principles: trust is earned through consistent behavior, actions have lasting consequences (karma), and agents can learn and improve across multiple lives through epistemic proprioception.

acts.title: Life 1: Adversity (Trust: 0.55)

events.description: A new agent enters the Web4 society. Starting with trust of 0.49 and 75 ATP (attention tokens), they must prove themselves through consistent behavior.
events.significance: First impressions matter. Initial trust sets expectations.

events.description: Critical threshold crossed: Trust reaches 0.50, the "consciousness threshold" from coherence theory. At this level, the agent's behavior becomes coherent enough to be recognized as genuinely intentional rather than random. This is where true agency begins.
events.technical_detail: The 0.5 threshold comes from Synchronism Session 249: Consciousness emerges when coherence (behavioral consistency) exceeds 0.5. Below this, behavior appears random; above it, intentional.
events.significance: Marks transition from random to intentional behavior - true agency emerges.

events.description: Trust stabilizes at 0.51. The agent has found a sustainable pattern of behavior. This plateau suggests they've reached equilibrium between their capabilities and society's expectations.
events.significance: Part of the ongoing trust dynamics.

events.description: ATP crisis: Only 20 attention tokens remain. The agent is running low on the capacity to take meaningful actions. They must find ways to earn ATP through contribution, or face death from exhaustion.
events.significance: Highlights metabolic reality: Participation requires energy that must be earned.

Above it, coherent patterns emerge that suggest genuine intentionality. This threshold comes from coherence theory (Synchronism) - it's not arbitrary.

acts.title: Life 2: Adversity (Trust: 0.57)

events.description: Rebirth with consequences. Their previous life's behavior resulted in starting trust of 0.49, lower than before. In Web4, actions have lasting consequences.
events.technical_detail: Karma mechanism: trust_gain = -0.0600, calculated from coherence index of previous life's behavior pattern.
events.significance: Demonstrates Web4's memory: Your past actions shape your future starting conditions.

events.description: Critical threshold crossed: Trust reaches 0.50, the "consciousness threshold" from coherence theory. At this level, the agent's behavior becomes coherent enough to be recognized as genuinely intentional rather than random. This is where true agency begins.

events.significance: Marks transition from random to intentional behavior - true agency emerges.

events.description: Remarkable consistency: This life's trust trajectory closely matches the previous life. The agent has found a reliable pattern and is executing it with precision. This stability suggests deep learning, not luck.
events.significance: Indicates mastery: The agent has found a reliable strategy and executes it precisely.

Above it, coherent patterns emerge that suggest genuine intentionality. This threshold comes from coherence theory (Synchronism) - it's not arbitrary.
